title: Jeffree Star proud of 'little brother' James Charles in awkward clip
text:
Jeffree and James were once close friends (Pictures: YouTube)

Jeffree Star and James Charles have had their differences (to say the least) this year after the internet watched the drama with Tati Westbrook unfold.

Now, in Shane Dawson’s new series, a clip showing Jeffree gushing about how proud he was of his ‘little brother’ has made fans feel incredibly awkward.

With Shane taking a trip into the makeup guru’s warehouses, he asked: ‘How much does James Charles sell?’

‘A lot,’ Jeffree laughed, grinning away. ‘He’s doing so amazing, so proud of him, he’s killing it. He’s like my little brother.’

The comment didn’t pass fans by, with one writing: ‘When Jeffree said James was like his little brother, my heart ached.’

Jeffree said he was ‘proud’ of his ‘little brother’ (Picture: YouTube)

‘The way he talks about James after he said all that s*** online really makes me feel gross inside,’ another added.

Advertisement

Advertisement

One more viewer wrote: ‘It makes me kinda sad to see how Jefree was so proud of James and thought of him as his little brother and then all this drama took place…. Like wow [sic].’

Despite the pair previously being close friends, drama kicked off earlier this year when fellow beauty guru Tati uploaded a 45-minute exposé video on James, accusing him of lying about a brand deal and ‘manipulating people’s sexuality’.

James then uploaded a video, denying many of the claims and telling his side of the story.

Jeffree later waded into the drama, supporting Tati as her subscriber count rapidly increased, and sending vicious messages to James, which the 20-year-old shared in a video.

The drama began when Tati uploaded an exposé video about James (Picture: @Tati/Youtube)

Calling a truce with his former friend, Jeffree then apologised for his part in the drama.

He said in a video, titled Never Doing This Again: ‘Today I know what people want. They want me to sit here and degrade James. They want me to open up my phone and expose it all.

‘I’m done doing that. I’m willing to bite the bullet and let anyone think what they want. But today I will not be posting voice memos, I will not be posting text messages.’

Shane is set to address the drama (Picture: shane)

The star added: ‘Yesterday took me back to the old Jeffree and I was in a very dark place, I sat there for hours and it started to get really dark in my head.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘What I mean by that is you guys know me for being brutally honest, keeping it real… A lot of you have seen some brutal tweets and text messages.

‘Because I sent those things it does not mean I hate James Charles,’ he affirmed before saying: ‘Are we the best of friends? No.

‘But we had a connection and I think I mishandled our friendship.’

description: Jeffree Star proud of 'little brother' James Charles in awkward Shane Dawson clip after Tati Westbrook drama.
